sys_atf_step.description: Assert the following: The following fields are visible: Client Site, Procurement Complete, Watch list, Strategies, Out of scope, Estimate at completion, Discount Rate %, Assumptions, Allow time card reporting on, Actual effort, Number, Score, Handoff date, Project manager, State, Planned capital, Investment Class, Order, Goals, Actual duration, Phase, Recalculate score on project change, Budget cost, Contract, Work notes list, MSP Support Go-Live, Priority, Onboarding Survey Recipients, Business Unit, Compliance Survey Recipients, Program, Investment Type, Derive assignee list from resource plan, Actual end date, Net present value, Value Score, Risk Score, Work notes, Internal rate of return %, Derive time component from planned dates, Status, Planned end date, Business Capabilities, Planned benefit, Project Name, Actual start date, Actual cost, Assignment group, Customer Order, Additional assignee list, Description, Business case, Planned effort, Risk of not performing, Planned ROI %, Update actual effort from time card, Planned duration, Calculation, In scope, Constraint date, Sales Site, Execution type, Rate Model, Department, Approved start date, Planned return, Project Kickoff, Approved end date, Impacted Business Applications, Assigned to, Planned start date, Portfolio, Signature Date, Total planned cost, Enablers, Order Line Items, Size Score, Estimate to completion, Planned operating, Percent complete, Risk of performing, Schedule, Barriers, Project schedule date format, Beta, Project Closure, Impacted Business Units, Project Services Recipients, Account The following fields are read only: Estimate at completion, Actual effort, Number, Actual duration, Budget cost, Net present value, Internal rate of return %, Derive time component from planned dates, Planned ROI %, Constraint date, Planned return, Total planned cost, Estimate to completion, Beta The following fields are mandatory: Assignment group, Project Name With a failure timeout of 30 Seconds
